post.text: Sadly, the American dream is dead. But if I ever get elected president, I will bring it back, bigger and better than ever. â€¢DJT

comment.author: Drake
comment.text: Deluded people....what has Trump ever done for you. Nothing! No wonder...make America Great Again...not with Trump. Ignorance all around!

replies.author: Kevin
replies.text: You're an idiot, Obama did nothing for our country

replies.author: Drake
replies.text: I think that is what I was implying...idiot.

replies.author: Zack
replies.text: Drake then you need to reword your statement ,because you are wrong
